SMAX is a cryptocurrency that was launched in December 2017. It is a decentralized and community-driven cryptocurrency that is based on the SMAX blockchain, which is a hybrid blockchain technology that combines the advantages of Proof of Stake (PoS) and Delegated Proof of Stake (DPoS) consensus algorithms.
SMAX is a utility token that is used on the SMAX blockchain to facilitate transactions and provide users with various services such as staking, staking rewards, and various other applications. SMAX is also used to pay for various services within the SMAX community, such as staking rewards, transaction fees, and other services.
SMAX is a relatively new cryptocurrency that has gained a lot of popularity and attention in the crypto community. It has a market capitalization of around $145 million as of August 2021 and a total supply of around 1.8 billion SMAX tokens.
SMAX has a strong community and a dedicated team of developers and supporters who are working to improve the SMAX blockchain and expand its use cases. SMAX is also listed on various cryptocurrency exchanges and is traded with a market capitalization of around $145 million.
It is important to note that SMAX is a relatively new cryptocurrency and it is still in its early stages of development. As such, it is important to do your own research and due diligence before investing in SMAX or any cryptocurrency for that matter.
